Summary: Orange light that moved from south to north then vanished. Followed by helicopters
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around October 31st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding outside getting ready to go trick or treating. Noticed an orange light that moved south to north, it hovered then disappeared. Maybe a minute later two helicopters appeared following the objects path. This is the second time this same object has appeared in the past 4 months. Same object same color same flight path. Both times it helicopters appeared and followed the flight path within a minute of the object appearing. Multiple witnesses both times
